00018 #ifndef DEC_LIMITS_H
00019 #define DEC_LIMITS_H
00020 
00021 #include <limits>
00022 
00023 #if __WORDSIZE == 64
00024  typedef signed long int sint_t;
00025  #define sintmax_t numeric_limits<signed long int>::max()
00026  #define sintmin_t numeric_limits<signed long int>::min()
00027 
00028  typedef unsigned long int uint_t;
00029  #define uintmax_t numeric_limits<unsigned long int>::max()
00030  #define uintmin_t numeric_limits<unsigned long int>::min()
00031 #else
00032  typedef signed int sint_t;
00033  #define sintmax_t numeric_limits<signed int>::max()
00034  #define sintmin_t numeric_limits<signed int>::min()
00035 
00036  typedef unsigned int uint_t;
00037  #define uintmax_t numeric_limits<unsigned int>::max()
00038  #define uintmin_t numeric_limits<unsigned int>::min()
00039 #endif
00040 
00041 #endif
